TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputPassword extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並且可用來建立可讓使用者輸入密碼，單行文字方塊。The class is derived from the class and is used to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter a password. 當使用控制項，屬性張貼至伺服器，每次提交表單時。When using the control, the property is posted to the server each time the form is submitted. 屬性控制項不會保留在檢視狀態。The property for the control is not persisted in view state. 屬性會指定可以在文字方塊中輸入的字元數目上限。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 屬性可讓您指定文字方塊的寬度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 使用屬性來判斷使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。Use the property to determine the value entered in the text box by the user. 控制項提供事件所引發的時機屬性變更發佈至伺服器之間的值。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 這可讓您建立事件處理常式，每次引發事件時執行一組自訂的指示。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不提供內建的方式，回傳至伺服器。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必須提供支援回傳至伺服器，例如網頁上的另一個控制項或控制項。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting back to the server, such as an or an control. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用``， ``，和``以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的 HTML 控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the ``, ``, and `` HTML controls declaratively on a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/CS/htmlinputcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_1/VB/htmlinputvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何在呼叫期間，以程式設計方式加入同一個 HTML 控制項`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML controls programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體控制使用預設值。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它會建立`password`輸入文字方塊控制項。It creates a `password` type text box control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 密碼 」 的常值字串。The "password" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入， ，和使用預設建構函式來建立簡單 登入畫面 Web Form 網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add , , and controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/CS/htmlinput2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInput_2/VB/htmlinput2vb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the attributes of the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除`Value`以防止它所呈現的檢視狀態集合中的屬性，然後呼叫基底類別的方法。The method removes the `Value` attribute from the view state collection to prevent it from being rendered, and then calls the base class's method.
